info.title: DotMac Enhanced ISP Management API
info.description:
Complete ISP Management System with Real Database Integration
    
    ## Features:
    - **Support & Ticketing System** (35 endpoints)
    - **Customer Management** (25 endpoints)
    - **Service Management** (45 endpoints)
    - **Billing & Finance** (40 endpoints)
    - **Network Operations** (50 endpoints)
    
    ## Authentication:
    Bearer token authentication required for all endpoints
    
    ## Database:
    Connected to PostgreSQL with real data persistence

get.description: Health check with database connectivity test

List support tickets with comprehensive filtering and pagination.

Features:
- Filter by status, priority, category
- Filter by customer or assigned agent
- SLA breach detection
- Pagination support

schema.title: Response List Tickets Api V1 Tickets Get

post.description:
Create a new support ticket.

Features:
- Automatic SLA assignment based on priority
- Customer validation
- Ticket history tracking
- Notification triggering

get.description:
Get detailed ticket information including history and comments.

Features:
- Full ticket details
- Customer information
- Comment thread
- Activity history
- SLA metrics

schema.title: Response Get Ticket Details Api V1 Tickets  Ticket Id  Get

post.description:
Assign ticket to support agent or team.

Features:
- Agent workload balancing
- Priority adjustment
- Assignment history tracking
- Customer notification

schema.title: Response Add Ticket Comment Api V1 Tickets  Ticket Id  Comments Post
Response Get Ticket History Api V1 Tickets  Ticket Id  History Get

get.description: Get SLA compliance status for all tickets

schema.title: Response Get Sla Status Api V1 Tickets Sla Status Get

get.description: List customers with filtering and search

schema.title: Response List Customers Api V1 Customers Get

get.description: Get all services for a customer

schema.title: Response Get Customer Services Api V1 Customers  Customer Id  Services Get
Response List Services Api V1 Services Get
Response List Invoices Api V1 Invoices Get
Response Process Payment Api V1 Payments Post
Response List Network Devices Api V1 Network Devices Get
Response Get Network Status Api V1 Network Status Get
